DOC.brief_summary: This study intend determine whether addition trospium chloride xanomeline tartrate ameliorate peripheral cholinergic side effect previously experience xanomeline tartrate administer alone .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Comparing Effects Xanomeline Alone Xanomeline Plus Trospium
DOC.detailed_description: In inpatient study , volunteer receive either xanomeline alone , xanomeline plus trospium 7 day . Subjects report cholinergic side effect daily via visual analog scale , nausea , vomit , diarrhea , sweat excessive salivation . Clinician administer scale also administer daily assessment cholinergic side effect .
